sentences.en: And that our natural resources are not in exhaustible and inexhaustible.
sentences.cn: 自然资源不是用之不竭的.

sentences.en: Chapter three is the empirical analysis of economic growth with exhaustible resources.
sentences.cn: 第三章:土地资源与经济增长的实证检验.

sentences.en: For the coal is an exhaustible resource, Determination of its rational mining scale, its sustainable exploitation and utilization have caught extensive attentions of governments and theorists.
sentences.cn: 煤炭资源是一种可耗竭性资源，如何确定其合理的开采规模，实现可持续开发和利用已经引起政府和学术界的广泛关注。

sentences.en: Its competitors such as stone, brick, metal and plastic are all derived from exhaustible mineral sources.
sentences.cn: 其他竞争性材料如石料 、 砖 、 金属和塑料管都是从易被竭尽的矿产资源中提取的.

sentences.en: Out of the sluice springs an exhaustible supply of water.
sentences.cn: 水从水闸中源源不断的涌出.

sentences.en: People on earth should be fully aware that water resource is limited and exhaustible.
sentences.cn: 人们应该清楚地认识到水资源是有限的,而且是会枯竭的.

sentences.en: We can divide the nature resources into two parts , one is exhaustible resources renewable resources.
sentences.cn: 一定时期一定地域内所拥有的自然资源,可分为耗竭性资源与非耗竭性资源两大类.

sentences.en: Your willpower is an exhaustible supply, so don't force yourself to finish tasks if you don't have to.
sentences.cn: 你的意志力是会枯竭的，所以如果没有必要，不要强迫自己完成任务。

words.tran_cn: 使筋疲力尽的；使耗尽的
耗尽；用尽；使…精疲力尽（exhaust的过去式）
耗尽；使…精疲力竭；排出（exhaust的ing形式）
排出；耗尽；使精疲力尽；彻底探讨

trans.tran_cn: 可空竭的，可耗[抽，汲，用]尽的，用得尽的
